alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:52PM EDT until July 14 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TUSCOLA...NORTHERN LAPEER AND NORTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES... At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Otter Lake, or near Columbiaville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... North Branch and Clifford around 320 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Goodland Township, Burnside, Kings Mill, Silverwood and Fostoria. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
